name: iMemory
summary: iMemory - This is a logical game designed to train the memory and attention of the player.

name: Immortal Legacy: The Jade Cipher
summary: Delve deep into the origins of a sinister Chinese legend, and unearth the secrets of an island’s forgotten past in this pulse-pounding adventure.

name: I'm on Observation Duty
summary: Your job is to monitor live surveillance camera footage and spot anomalies in the monitored rooms. Anomalies range from furniture movement to otherworldly intruders. When you spot an anomaly you have to file a report to fix it. You will need sharp eyes and good memory to survive the entire night.

name: I'm Fine
summary:
I'm Fine is a VR suicide awareness experience like no other, the experience is intended to shed light on a very dark and taboo subject that we don't talk about enough.

This is an educational piece of work and has no entertainment value what so ever, it is to be used as a means of experiencing what sufferers of suicidal thoughts go through in their darkest hours, so that you may better understand people who are suicidal.

name: I'm Hungry
summary: Play the role of a fast-food restaurant employee in I'm Hungry VR game. You can definitely learn how to make fries, hamburgers and milk shake in the VR world and possibly the real world, as well! The game takes advantage of the VR technique, and it perfectly shows a realistic vision of a fast-food kitchen to the gamers.

name: Impale Your Friends!
summary: Impale Your Friends! is a lightning fast, 4-player, couch multiplayer game about throwing spikes to do... well... it's in the title! Combat is simple to learn, difficult to master, and brutally intense.

name: Immortal: Unchained - Storm Breaker
summary:
The fall of Apexion was swift and brutal. The unstoppable hordes of Undead pierced the defenses of the outpost Storm Break and continued their relentless invasion. Eliminate the threat and discover the Sea of Scars, an all-new area of Immortal: Unchained.

Traverse the Sea of Scars’ mysterious seabed and explore the ruins of Storm Break to locate undiscovered secrets guarded by challenging new enemies and creatures. Engage in monumental boss fights with powerful new weapons, including the legendary Brightreaver, a devastating weapon capable of destroying its victims with super-charged lightning.

name: Immortal Realms: Vampire Wars
summary:
Immortal Realms: Vampire Wars is an engaging strategy game set in a dark vampire world in turmoil, that combines empire management and turn-based combat with unique card-game elements. Descend into a mythical world filled with horrors and legends – and hurl yourself into a compelling gothic adventure paired with a challenging game experience. Discover the secrets of Nemire and experience an enthralling story from the perspective of four mighty vampire lords, each with their own goals and agendas.

Command one of three unique vampire clans with distinctive units, powers, gameplay mechanics and characters, making strategic manoeuvres in “Kingdom” mode before switching over to “Combat” mode to take on your foes in tense, closely fought battles. Original card game elements enhance the gameplay and provide a refreshing take on the genre. Each clan and vampire lord has access to their own set of cards, which can be combined to powerful effect.

name: Immortals Fenyx Rising
summary:
From the creators of Assassin’s Creed Odyssey comes a storybook adventure about a forgotten hero on a quest to save the Greek gods.

Embark on a journey to the Isle of the Blessed, taken over by dangerous creatures of mythology. Prove your legendary heroism by taking on their leader, Typhon, the deadliest monster in all of mythology in a face-off for the ages.
Explore a beautiful fantasy world where tricky puzzles, mysterious dungeons and heroic feats await. The journey will be as challenging and rewarding as the final destination.
Will you be the Hero of the legends foretold?

name: Image of Perfection
summary: Image of Perfection is a creepy, atmospheric RPG about confronting fears and your past. Rather than a pure horror RPG, this is a story-driven game about confronting unsettling truths and accepting yourself.

name: Immortal Love: Kiss of the Night
summary: When your beloved falls ill, you'll do anything to save her. You quickly discover that the price is much higher than you thought when you awake to find yourself in a coffin and your love has been kidnapped! Stuck in the middle of a war between the Hunters and Vampires, it's up to you to find out why the Vampire Master wants your beloved and save her before it's too late! Do you have what it takes?

name: I'm the dirt-for art
summary: In the name of art, doing obscene things. She is a crush on my junior, she took off a piece of clothes just to become my painting model. She is an amateur model who works part-time in the academy of fine arts. She is cheerful and unrestrained. She has a boyfriend in a relationship. Cheating or being seen as scum.

name: Immortal
summary: Only a minute from death to eternal life.

name: Imaginator
summary: An indie game in which you fight against your own mind while being held hostage by it.

name: Imaginary Worlds Bundle
summary: Artifex Mundi Hidden Object Games Bundle

name: I'm Keyboardman
summary: 我，是一名键盘侠 我一直觉得，这个世界需要批判，需要改变 而我，是那唯一可以改变这一切的天命之子 是的，就是现在，就用我的键盘 拯救这虚伪、愚蠢、浮夸、残忍的世界吧！

name: Imagination
summary: Imagination is a free-to-play online multiplayer board game where you create associations. Choose from hundreds of associations, guess opponents’ cards and win.

name: Immunity
summary: Immunity is a fast-paced arcade shooter with endless waves of relentless enemies. Play as the last surviving white blood-cell and destroy opposing threats that wish only to vanquish you.

name: Impostor Factory
summary: A bonkers time-loop tragicomedy murder mystery thriller featuring multiple casualties and a suspicious cat, from the creator of To the Moon.

name: Imaginarium
summary: Discover a new world filled with interesting creatures, mysterious places and amazing stories. Will you be able to develop your own settlement or discover all the secret places of the world "Imaginarium"?

name: Imperiums: Greek Wars
summary: Imperiums: Greek Wars is a unique combination of turn-based 4X and historical grand strategy with a mythological twist. Explore the ancient world and open it up to your people. Survive, expand, conquer... and win!

name: Impossible Soaring
summary: Soar through the sky at intense speed while gracefully dodging perilously close obstacles. Test your reflexes and precision maneuvering ability as you master the challenging but intuitive skill of flight. Greater risk means greater reward!

name: Immortal Girl
summary: Died immediately! Immediate retry! Find out how to capture while dying! The immortal maiden "Kagura" who wishes to die. Challenge The Belflame Castle for the Jewel of Death "LARS" which gives death to anything. However, Belflame Castle is a trap to block the way.

name: Immanence
summary:
Immanence is a psychological thriller, the spiritual successor to the one of the previous games by Cat In A Jar Games called Nyctophilia. This is an author's project, developed by one person. 
 
The game keeps the main features of the original, such as atmosphere, visual style and approach to the soundtrack, while raising the bar for quality. More attention is paid to the gameplay and variety of situations. 
 
Immanence is a small free adventure, full walkthrough takes approximately 1-2 hours.

name: Impossible Draw
summary: Mimic the signs of virtuality to progress through a world where colors, shapes and music forms an ecstatic atmosphere. Draw symbols, collect bytes and enjoy the hypnotic mix of audiovisual harmony!

name: Imagine Lifetimes
summary: A satirical simulation game about the meaning of life. Born with the ability to choose, your actions and decisions shape the paths ahead of you. Question the absurdity of existence as you figure out what it means to be alive...

name: Impressions
summary: WE'RE NOT ALONE. HOW DO YOU FEEL? Take on the role of a news pundit in Impressions. Give your thoughts on the discovery of aliens to the people watching and shape the world's perception on the newly discovered aliens.

name: I'm Calling the Cops!
summary: I'm Calling The Cops! is a first-person cartoony action strategy game in which you manage a small store. Customers buy items but they also steal them! See how much profit you can make in an in-game week (17 minutes IRL time).

name: IMM Defense 2
summary: This is a very beautiful two-way fluorescent tower defense game.

name: Impossiball: Gamers Challenge
summary: Impossiball - Gamers Challenge is a tiny skill-based 3D platformer game that will truly challenge your skills! This game is against the player - in fact, it tries to get you to fail pretty hard! Even tough rolling around with a ball may seem all easy - the game is really not! Beat the game or poorly fail!

name: Immortal Love: Stone Beauty - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you save your beloved from a dangerous sculptor’s obsession?

name: Imbroglio
summary: Beautiful worlds and brain-melting puzzles.

name: I'mitation: The Eight Suicide Note
summary: A first-person search-type horror game developed for developers. Use the night vision, rean, slide and other actions to find eight items in the facility. Content that can be gameplayed in a short time.

name: Impact
summary: A stylish and visceral single-player FPS featuring a fluid stunt system, destructible voxel environments, loads of bullet time, a unique one-armed protagonist, and a dark electronic soundtrack.

name: I'm on Observation Duty 2
summary: Your job is to monitor live surveillance camera footage and spot anomalies in the monitored rooms. Anomalies range from furniture movement to otherworldly intruders. When you spot an anomaly you have to file a report to fix it. You will need sharp eyes and good memory to survive the entire night.

name: Immortal Legacy: The Jade Cipher - Console Edition
summary: The search for immortality is just one reason that brings you to Yingzhou Island, located deep in the Dragon’s Triangle. Playing as ex-special forces soldier Tyre, you’re also here to discover the truth behind your mother’s mysterious death. Finding out how that event and her enigmatic past are tied to the secrets that lie at the heart of the island will see you battle through not only a mercenary army sent in to excavate it, but the horrors they’ve unwittingly set free.

name: Imaginary Friends
summary: Imaginary Friends is a RPG Maker VX Ace horror/puzzle game that explores childhood fears and loneliness. You explore the main character's childhood by solving puzzles, while covering the past events to find the reason why she doesn't have any friends. The Game relies more on psychological horror rather than jump scares and gore.

name: Impulse Control
summary: Realistic building destruction meets personality quiz! Squash the meanies using skill and wits to unlock your unique personality profile. The levels feature challenging structures that won't fall down easily.

name: Imasugu Tsukaeru Mamechishiki Quiz Zatsugaku Ou DS
summary: Imasugu Tsukaeru Mamechishiki: Quiz Zatsugaku-Ou DS is a Puzzle game, developed by Jaleco Entertainment and published by Kamui, which was released in Japan in 2010.

name: Impetus: Clamor in Portis
summary:
Impetus is a tactical game inspired by the events that took place after the Fall of the Roman Empire (4th-5th century AD), in which the player takes command of a legion that survived the last battle and tries to defeat any other possible legion they may encounter.

Each player (PvP) will command the units that the legion is composed of, each of which has its own characteristics.

name: I'm Bored, Let's Explore (Mall)
summary: A game about revisiting the past with a friend

name: I'm Bored, Let's Explore (Ruins)
summary: A game about discovering the past with a sibling.

name: Impossible Maze
summary:
Impossible Maze is a minimalist puzzle game. You may have heard the word "impossible triangle", which is a triangle intepreted as a single solid object by our visial system, but cannot exist as one in real life. 
In this game, you will manipulate a cube through a "impossible maze".

name: Impulse
summary:
A free-to-play, play-to-earn first-person multiplayer shooter by Ascendance Games.

Play Impulse completely free by joining our training arenas where you can earn Common Credits just by getting eliminations to buy NFTs with real world value that you can trade or sell. Amp it up a bit by joining the Ascendance Credit arenas, where you can earn real money for every kill!

Join Deathmatch in a one versus all brawl, or play in a Teams mode to go up against another group of players in an all-or-nothing showdown. Earn DNA points as you play to fully customize your characters the way you want with our robust character creator. Start off by playing as a metallic Synth, to branch off and become a Human, Cyborg, Alien, or more!

You can adjust your character to be a large brute that can take more damage, or be smaller and nimble but make sure not to get hit!

name: I'm Gonna Serve You 4
summary:
My name is Aoyama Kouji. I'm an ordinary guy living an uneventful life as a university student. Because my parents are separated, my uncle, a somewhat strange man who runs a restaurant, has taken the role of being a father to me. Although it's hard work, I actually like helping out at the restaurant from time to time.

One day, while walking with Himeko, who I've been friends with since childhood, I was hit by a car and nearly died! Thanks to a miracle, I awoke to find myself in a hospital bed in America. After some bizarre adventures, I return to Japan and decide to move into my uncle's house where I can help him run his restaurant.

Imagine my surprise when several beautiful girls approach me to tell me how happy they are that we'll be working together. First, there's Himeko, who tells me she'll do anything for me, followed by Chizuru, a beautiful girl who lives in the neighborhood who wants to shower me with attention. Takano, a gorgeous girl from my class, also confesses her desire to do anything she can for me, as does Leo, the quiet girl who lives and works at the restaurant. At first I think they're just happy that I wasn't killed in the car accident, but gradually I realize that they've all fallen in love with me for some bizarre reason. The girls are spending every moment they can, taking care of me and giving me all their attention.

Am I the luckiest guy in the world, or what?

name: I'm Scared of Girls
summary: I’m Scared of Girls, a small RPG Maker 2003 story-driven adventure game developed and published in the rpgmaker.net community by Moga (also known by the username CARRIONBLUE). It tells the story of Lamb, a young cross-dresser who finds himself in a purgatory-like dungeon. There, he must cut the ties to his former life in order to be reborn.

name: Immortals Fenyx Rising: Limited Edition
summary:
The Limited Edition of the game includes: Copy of the game & digital content: The Orion's Blessed Weapons Pack

Immortals Fenyx Rising brings grand mythological adventure to life. Play as Fenyx, a new winged demigod on a quest to save the Greek gods and their home from a dark curse. Take on mythological beasts, master the legendary powers of the gods and defeat Typhon, the deadliest Titan in Greek mythology, in an epic fight for the ages. The fate of the world is at stake – you are the gods’ last hope.Immortals Fenyx Rising is a fresh and witty take on the open world action adventure genre, featuring dynamic action, combat and stories inspired by Greek mythology. Roam freely across a beautifully stylized world and use extraordinary abilities gifted by the gods against fearsome mythological monsters. Treacherous trials, heroic feats and the very underworld itself await your bravery. Experience a tale for the ages, of gods and monsters, and become the legend you were destined to be.

name: Immortals Fenyx Rising: Gold Edition
summary:
Immortals Fenyx Rising Gold Edition
Master the legendary powers of the gods, and defeat Typhon, the deadliest Titan in Greek mythology, in an epic fight for the ages.

- CONFRONT MYTHOLOGICAL ENEMIES
Face off against legendary beasts like Cyclops, Medusa, or Minotaur, and confront them in fast-paced aerial and melee combat, combining your god-given abilities and weapons.

- WIELD THE POWER OF GODS
The gods of Olympus have blessed you with gifts. Use them to fight mythical monsters, solve ancient puzzles, and explore the vast open world.

name: Immortal Love: Stone Beauty
summary: Can you save your beloved from a dangerous sculptor's obsession?

name: Impossible Pixels
summary: Impossible Pixels is a visually appealing bullet-hell pixel game with tons of action and an entertaining but not obligatory story. Use your mouse, patience and quick reflexes to evade a barrage of oncoming foes and make your way through 14+ unique, hand-crafted levels.

name: Immortal: Gates of Pyre
summary: Immortal: Gates of Pyre is an action-packed Battle Strategy game that strips out the chores and focuses on the fun for everyone. Immortal lets the player assume the form of a god-like commander that forges alliances, commands armies, and conquers their enemies from on high.

name: I'm on Observation Duty 3
summary: An indie psychological horror game. The player has to look for anomalies in a haunted house and report anyhting suspicious (furniture moving, extra objects, intruders). The game has both VR- and non-VR -versions.

name: Improbable Soccer
summary: Improbable Soccer is a chaotic multiplayer soccer game for up to six players. Jump, roll, kick the ball and even your foes to achieve the victory. Dive in a frenetic match with your friends!

name: I'm Just Popping Down the Dungeon, Does Anybody Want Anything?
summary: A rogue-like-lite-like-lite dungeon crawler with none of the bits that I don't like.

name: Immortals Fenyx Rising: A New God
summary: As Fenyx, overcome the legendary trials and challenges of the gods of Olympos to change the Greek Pantheon and fulfill your destiny.

name: I'm Oh, So Busy...:A Week with Yoshimi
summary:
New beginnings can be a challenge, especially when they start hundreds of miles away from home! 
 
I'm Oh, So Busy...: A Week with Yoshimi explores a week in the life of Yoshimi Adelina Hertz as she makes her way in the world after finishing school. She deals with the challenge of finding her place in the world and the trials and tribulations that come with moving somewhere new. While at the same time, understanding her own insecurities and sense of self.

name: Imp of the Sun
summary: Restore the Sun’s light and end the Eternal Eclipse in this 2D fast-paced action-platformer game inspired by Peruvian cultures. Explore hand-crafted environments, battle and improve your skills to defeat the Four Keepers that stole the power of the Sun.

name: Immortal Saga
summary: Immortal Saga is a strategy RPG set in the war-ridden continent of Neart.

name: Immortals Fenyx Rising: Myths of the Eastern Realm
summary: Play a brand-new story inspired by Chinese mythology, where you'll encounter new gods and fight new monsters in a distant land as Ku, a new hero.

name: Immortals Fenyx Rising: The Lost Gods
summary: Experience a new top-down exploration perspective and brawler-style combat! Meet a new hero, Ash, embarking on an epic journey to reunite the Greek gods.

name: I'm A Pencil
summary:
This is a visual novel about a pencil. Yes, a freaking pencil!  
HAHAH- but, seriously, no joke! It is literally about a pencil!  
. . . . . .  
  
Features:  
  
Pencil.  
Eraser.  
Sharpener.  
Helicopter (yup!).  
4 Different achievements!

name: Immerse Land
summary: "Immerse Land" is a role story adventure game and a full-screen interactive micro-drama. You can enter different stories by through different choices. Emma drove her daughter to the amusement park, but they had an accident. Her daughter was lost mysteriously and Emma entered the lighthouse in search of her daughter with a few clues......

name: Immoral Quartet
summary: Immoral Quartet is an erotic Visual Novel.

name: Impossible Mission
summary:
Re-imagining of the original 1980s classic
Choose from 3 characters
New tutorial mode
3 game modes
Full games haring on PSP

It's hard to believe that it was twenty-five years since the original release. Impossible Mission was the first game to use real synthesized speech, an incredible development when first unleashed on the 8-bit formats. The original game included a random game-map system which ensured that no two games were the same. Although the original still stands the test of time today, inclusion of brand new graphics and sound ensures that Impossible Mission is primed to thrill a brand new audience.

The gamer takes the role of a secret agent attempting to stop evil genius Professor Elvin Atombender who has been tampering with National Security Computers. Players must penetrate Atombender's base, attempting to recover parts of the system password whilst avoiding deadly robots in a race against time.

Whilst the game has been re-written from the ground up and features new graphics, 3D objects, new Sound Effects and Music, the gameplay remains impressively loyal with the game layout changing for every new game. There are now three main characters to choose from plus a brand new tutorial mode. The player can now chose from three game modes, new, original and for the purist; a hybrid mode with the original gameplay using the updated graphics.

The PSP versions offer an unusual feature which allows players to send a full copy of their game to a friend by Wireless so they can try it for themselves.

name: Immunity Adventures
summary: Adventure through the body as an advantageous white blood cell. Try to remove all the viruses to protect the body. This 2d platformer features 16 real world viruses and 42 levels of the body. Travel through the lungs, the heart, the brain, and many many more.

name: I'm a King
summary: Role-playing strategy "I'm a King". Rule the kingdom, decide the fate of people, investigate, survive during periods of dark storms. This is only a small part of what you have to do.

name: Immortal Life
summary: Immortal Life is a beautiful single-player management game where you play as a member of a cultivation sect. Fleeing the destruction of your community, you discover a breathtaking valley where a young community welcomes you with open arms. You set yourself to work relentlessly, decided to help your new brothers and sisters make this settlement grow and flourish into a prosperous village.

name: Immortality
summary: Marissa Marcel was a film star. She made three movies. But none of the movies was ever released. And Marissa Marcel disappeared. The new game from Sam Barlow, creator of Her Story.

name: Immortus Temporus
summary: In "Immortus Temporus" crashing into hazards is... A perfectly viable strategy to beat the levels faster! Following the obvious routes won't get you the "gold medals" in this game. It's rules are designed to be broken. It is made for speedrunners, by a speedrunner.

name: Imaginaria
summary: Imaginaria is both a night watch and the night watcher. It's a military term, supposedly coming from Latin, Imaginarius: relative to a mental figure. Perhaps because under Imaginaria duty the mind likes to wander too. Here in Antarctica we do them since the incident. And tonight I am Imaginaria.

name: I'm Strongest Legend
summary: A first-person sword action game. The game is completed when the condition is achieved and you reached the destination.

name: Imperator: Rome - Centurion Bundle
summary: The splendor of the classical world shines in Imperator: Rome, but even the most glamorous palace could use a splash of extra color. This Content Bundle includes all of the themed expansions for Imperator: Rome in one package, so you can add the glories of Pyrrhus and the quarrels of the Diadochi for one low price.

name: Imperator: Rome - Heirs of Alexander Content Pack
summary: The Hellenistic kingdoms of the Eastern Mediterranean and Asia take center stage in this Content Pack for Imperator: Rome. ·Unique Missions Trees for Five Nations ·Shared Mission Tree ·Wonder Designer ·New Events ·New Deities ·New Treasures ·New Music

name: Imperator: Rome - The Punic Wars Content Pack
summary: This free content pack for Imperator: Rome includes new events and units models to illustrate the greatest wars of the classical age - the superpower showdown between the nascent Roman Republic, and the established Carthaginian Empire.

name: Imperator: Rome - Magna Graecia Content Pack
summary: The Magna Graecia content pack includes:New Greek Missions.New Deities.Apotheosis.Sacred Treasures.New Music and other art.

name: Imperator: Rome - Epirus Content Pack
summary: As Rome’s power extended to the Greek colonies in Southern Italy, it was forced to do battle with one of the great generals of the classical world.

name: I'm Russia
summary: Shoot’em up platformer inspired by Russia the beginning of the 90s and old retro games.

name: Immunity Tales
summary: The tale of a group of immune cells around the body full of fights against several micro-organisms, challenges and puzzles will keep you glued to the screen until the end of the game.

name: Impossible Target
summary: Impossible target is a challenging sci-fi version of operation. You guide your rocket to the red target on the map without exploding. This game offers extremely challenging levels. Can you win?

name: Imagined Leviathans
summary: A scavenger tale set in Britain's arctic future. Explore the English tundra as you gather survivors frozen by fear, evade the mysterious leviathans stalking them, and thaw out the truth.

name: Imprisoned Queen
summary: The "Imprisoned Queen" is a game combining imprisonment, training and medieval style for the Queen's Glory series. Decades after the death of Queen Alisa, the powerful Kingdom of Norman invaded Keter. And they imprisoned Shane, the Queen of Keter. What will Shane's fate become...

name: Imercyve: Living with Intellectual Disability
summary: What is it like to live with diverse needs and feel uncomfortable in the face of simple, everyday scenarios?

name: Imprisoned Hyperion
summary: Imprisoned Hyperion is an immersive sim, first-person RPG. Explore the dark and dangerous dungeons of a world that has survived its end. Survive by finding safe resting places and cooking food. Help different creatures and learn the dark history of this world and your own.

name: Impulse, From Here!
summary: Impulse, From Here! is a 2D action game featuring unique aerial controls that allow you to blow yourself up in explosions as you progress! The stages are highly challenging and offer multiple routes, so there's replay-ability! Look at the way the cute girl gets beaten up badly!

name: Immortal Hero
summary: This is 3D RPG Game. You can level up by defeating monsters, or grow through specific equipment and skills. And you can also see hidden stories through interactive elements found in the middle of the game. Defeat the Demon King and become a world-saving hero.

name: I made a ...
summary: a puzzle about different camera perspectives at the same time

name: Impavidvm
summary: Impavidvm is a physics based platformer with puzzle solving components where you have to overcome increasingly complex obstacles, testing your abilities and observation skills.

name: Imugi
summary: Imugi is a point and click isometric puzzle game. Players can utilize mechanics such as box pushing, water flooding, and lightning strikes to make it past the trials laid out by the spirits of the mountain. Make it past the trial and ascend from Imugi to Dragon.

name: Imperial Grace
summary: Imperial Grace is a unique mix of romance, medieval intrigue, and strategy. Play as the new Empress of Calidya through a visual novel rife with ambition and deceit. Make choices that will change your fate and that of your nation, rule wisely to make your Empire prosper, and find love along the way!

name: Immense Threat
summary: Join the chickens in their war for the stolen dignity, and defeat the wicked Consumers!Immense Threat is a classic-style adventure platformer, set in future. Fight and shoot your way through dangerous enemies, and avoid deadly traps on over 20 levels!

name: Impact Trial: Simulation
summary: Impact Trial: Simulation is a shoot 'em up and narrative adventure videogame where we will be in the shoes of a novice who joins a program to save his planet.

name: Immortal Space God
summary: Fight till you can't then fight some more! A space combat simulator with survival crafting elements.

name: Imperivm: Great Battles of Rome - HD Edition
summary:
Lead the battles that forged the greatest Empire of all time.

Seven civilizations fighting for glory or freedom: Rome, Aegyptus, Britannia, Germania, Gallia, Hispania, and Carthago.

Real ancient heroes who pass on their charisma and expertise in the troops under their command and make the difference between victory or defeat in battle.

Enjoy the fast-paced RTC “Real-Time Conquest” gameplay. An Old School RTS oriented to military conquest:

- Military conquest-oriented RTS
Focus on military strategy and drive your efforts on commanding your troops.

- RPG features, playing a key role in battles
The battles become more realistic when RPG features come into play.

- Storyline based on historical facts, scenarios, and characters
Each battle was designed with input from historical experts.

Command your army in a 40% larger battlefield
Where you can lead more units and face more enemies. An even bigger Strategy and Conquest challenge than the original.

New dedicated Multiplayer server
- Up to 8 players
- 1vs1, 2vs2, 3v3 and 4vs4
- 7 Civs - 90 unique warriors
- 5,000 units fighting simultaneously
- Maps throughout the Roman Empire.

Agile and powerful Imperivm HD In-Game Editor
Create your own maps and battles and share them with your friends and/or the Imperivm World Gamers Community.

name: Impossible Simplified Cube
summary: 8 Level Parkour Game Think You Got What It Takes To Reach The End And Complete The Game!.

name: Immortals: Fenyx Rising - Shadowmaster Edition
summary: Includes copy of the Immortals Fenyx Rising game and the Hades the Shadowmaster Character Pack.

name: Impressive Title
summary: Impressive Title was a 3D RPG inspired by The Lion King.

name: Imaginary Realms Bundle
summary:
This bundle includes:
- Endless Fables 4: Shadow Within
- My Brother Rabbit
- Dreamwalker: Never Fall Asleep

name: Immure: Part Two
summary: A new door creeks open within the mysterious mansion. As the nightmare continues, Will must investigate a family tragedy. Murder, lies and sorrow fill the air. Uncover the truth and decide the fate of those who remain.

name: Impostor Inside Us
summary: Impostor inside us is a type Social deduction game. Let try !

name: Imperium BCE
summary: Imperium BCE is a real-time 3D strategy game in which you can build cities, control armies, use both spies and diplomats to achieve different political goals, make technological discoveries, trade, and sign laws. The game is all about making the right choices, at the right time.

name: I'm a love interest in my childhood friend's reverse harem!!!

Like in the original games, you have to check live surveillance footage to detect and report anomalies by type and location, which can be anything from a room's door opening, to the sudden presence of strange intruders.

The difference in this game is that a lot of the anomalies are either generic memes or Cirno_TV community-related jokes/references. Originally a private project, the game became public after a significant amount of interest was shown from audiences.

Waking up in your bed with three gorgeous devils is a pleasant surprise, but when you realize your parents were the price, reality sets in. Now, your only hope is to work alongside these girls to save your family—but what happens when your emotions move beyond the contract? Are you willing to take chances with just one, or will you pick all three?!

Sign on the dotted line and get ready for a hell-raising fun time with three sexy devil girls!

name: Immortal Game
summary:
Immortal Game represents the first ever free-to-play and play-and-earn version of chess with a built-in earning mechanism, and our mission is simple – provide existing chess players with the most nuanced and variable experience available coupled with financial rewards for their skills, while simultaneously introducing the game to an entirely new audience of investors and DeFi / GameFi enthusiasts.

Built on the Ethereum network, the project is available for both mobile phones and PCs, and whilst we were passionate about keeping the core rules of the gameplay unchanged, we have introduced an exciting new element, which will allow players to access fun features and new ways to play that will enhance the gaming experience, as well as maximize earning potential.

Had it been released before the launch of the console was cancelled, it would have become the first officially licensed title by the International Motor Sports Association and one of the first titles to be launched alongside the system.

Test your brain, eyes, and fingers with this new and exciting picture quiz! A picture is hidden here . . . but a picture of what? Tap your screen to “scratch” away part of the covering, but be careful—you only have a limited number of scratches! Can you guess what the image is before running out?

name: I Modo Mo Issho
summary:
i Modo Mo Issho (iモードもいっしょ) is a video game developed by Bomber Express and published by Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. It was released on May 24, 2001 for the PlayStation, and it is the third game and an expansion pack for Doko Demo Issyo and Koneko Mo Issho in the Doko Demo Issyo Series.

Like Koneko Mo Issho, save data for Doko Demo Issyo is required to play it. It features additional content, such as new environments and music.

It's most notable feature is its connection with the i-Mode phone service, a Japanese mobile phone service provided by DoCoMo that allowed an early form of Internet connectivity with mobile phones. Players can use an adapter to connect the phone to the Playstation console and connect to the online service, which allows players to to communicate to other players and the Pokepi, similar to the PocketStation.

It is also the last Doko Demo Issyo game to be released exclusively on the PlayStation. The online service ended on December 15th, 2002, but the offline features of the game were still available.

name: Imperium: Galactic War Classic

Three mighty factions struggle for supremacy of a battle-torn universe. Some fight for peace, others for glory and conquest, and others seek only profit, power and chaos.

name: Immortal Desire

Do you think you know the difference between an Imp and an Oaf?

In this game you're given a glimpse into the odd world of these bizarre creatures and you must take a guess at what you think you're looking at: Is it an IMP or an OAF?!

You can tap the picture to zoom out and see more, this will help you make a better guess but you'll get fewer points!

name: I'm on Observation Duty 6
summary: The most ambitious I'm on Observation Duty game yet with six unique levels. Gameplay is familiar to those who have played the previous games. The game is part of a series of popular "spot the difference" -type of horror games. In I'm on Observation Duty 6 the players job is to monitor live surveillance camera footage and spot anomalies in the monitored rooms. You can swap between different camera-views. An anomaly means that for example something (e.g. a piece of furniture) has moved, an extra object has appeared or something has disappeared. There's also scary intruders. When you notice something is different in any of the monitored rooms you have to file a report by clicking on the anomaly or choosing the right location and type of the anomaly from a menu to fix it. Anoamalies appear at random so the player never knows what is going to hapen next. Too many active and unreported anomalies means game over. Goal is to survive long enough (from 00:00 to 06:00 in game time). You will need sharp eyes and good memory to survive the entire night. The game contains psychological horror that mainly comes from making the player paranoid about what has changed in the house. There are also some scary monsters that might appear.

name: Imprecision
summary: Imprecision is a first/third person, action game set in The Middle Ages. In Imprecision, you play as a lone archer, Örvar, who is training to take down The Black Knights of Bjørn and their kingdom. You are determined to defeat King Bjørn the Bloodthirsty and take back what is yours.

name: Impulse
summary: IMPULSE is the next generation of carball. Game play simplicity provides for high-speed, competitive matches. Single player and multiplayer in a Classic game mode or in our new Us & Them game mode. Complete with an AI-powered bot named Vicky. Welcome to IMPULSE.

name: Impulse
summary: A game of carball.

On one side, a murderer with a mysterious objective, on the other, a detective with a sense of injustice who seeks to arrest him. Not necessary to know the story of the first game.

name: I'm Yearning for a Train Journey
summary: I haven't taken this kind of journey for a long time

name: Imi ga Wakaru to Zotto suru Manga
Impetus
summary:
Released as part of LUDUM DARE #27, whose theme was "ten seconds", IMPETUS was a short-lived collaborative game in which players across the world worked together around the clock to keep a doomed astronaut alive for as long as possible.

A player visiting the game's page would be presented with a picture of the unnamed unconscious woman, and a countdown indicating how long she had yet to live. Any player clicking the prominent "click to keep alive" button would result in the countdown being reset: by working together, by ensuring that the button was pressed at least once every ten seconds, players could attempt to keep her alive.

The game was victim of its success: after almost 12 hours of runtime, the traffic to the site reached such levels that it became inaccessible for more than ten seconds, resulting in the death of the character. The site remains accessible, but the game is no longer playable and only displays the end screen.

name: Immortality Paradox
summary: Immortality Paradox is a Touhou secondary game.

name: Impossible: A New Reality

In order to save your life, you’ve been transformed into a little, fluffy animal. Now, to reclaim your human form, you must assist your new magical friends in their quest against evil—as a familiar!

Indie Roquelite 2d

Kill hordes of demons as you unlock new items and skills, complete quests, upgrade your equipment and discover different ways of getting through the challenges that await you.

In the shocking He Mansion, it will be up to you to decide whether to live quietly or use your ingenuity!

name: Imperium Universalis

The mod spans from the Age of Empires, starting from the 10th of August 142 AUC (612 BCE), through the Archaic Period, the Classical Period, the Early Hellenistic Period, the Late Hellenistic Period, the Imperial Period to end in Early Migration Period 1127 AUC (374 CE).

name: Immortal Heart
summary: A town bustles with news of a young woman’s abduction. Having lost your younger brother two years previous and sensing a connection, you begin to search for leads. You find yourself at the doorstep of a man named Vis, who has been said to have information on anything that you could ever want to know. Vis agrees to tell you about your missing brother, but only for a price… that is impossible for you to pay. Vis extends to you an offer: “Take this luggage and get on the train that I tell you to.”

name: I’m a Magical Girl’s Pet?!
summary: One night you hear an explosion outside your bedroom window and decide to investigate. You stumble upon two girls who appear to be filming a fight scene, only to discover it's a real magical battle! You recognize one of the girls and impulsively jump in to protect her, only to be left in critical condition after being struck by powerful magic. In order to save your life, you’ve been transformed into a little, fluffy animal. Now, to reclaim your human form, you must assist your new magical friends in their quest against evil—as a familiar!

A modern day, coming-of-age story that will stun you with its interactivity, beautiful graphics, and talented voice acting.

Roleplay different kinds of love with our four male love interests. Go on dates, text message each other, and shower them with gifts! Which one will be your Mr. Right?

name: Implication

What comes first? Money? Happiness? Reputation? Justice? Play through each case to find out what becomes of you, your career, and your community.

name: I'm a Grown Up!! Dreamy Sweetie The Devil Slayer

name: Ima Survivor
summary: IMA SURVIVOR - Shipwrecked on a remote island, You have to try to survive on Your own.

name: I Made Myself a Ship

name: Improbability
summary: You are all assigned with investigating the backrooms and containing the anomaly. Be aware. There is a high chance of casualties, psychological damage, trauma, and frightening encounters. The safety of the United States relies on you, but what secrets could these members be hiding?

name: Immortal Markets Stock Market Simulator Game

name: Imitation
summary: Join the experiment! Imitation is a brain-teasing guessing game. It pits humans against AI. Given a set of questions, players must choose if the answer was provided by a human or generated by an AI. Can you tell the difference between human and AI?

name: Immortal Desires
summary: Immortal Desires, Book 1 is the first book of the Immortal Desires series. It is followed by Immortal Desires, Book 2, and Immortal Desires, Book 3.

name: Immortal Desires: Book 2
summary: Immortal Desires, Book 2 is the second book of the Immortal Desires series. It succeeds its first book, Immortal Desires, Book 1 and is followed by Immortal Desires, Book 3.

name: Immemory
summary: In Immemory, Chris Marker has used the format of the CD-Rom to create a multi-layered, multimedia memoir. The reader investigates “zones” of travel, war, cinema, and poetry, navigating through photographs, film clips, music, and text, as if physically exploring Marker’s memory itself. The result is a veritable 21st-century Remembrance of Things Past, an exploration of the state of memory in our digital era. With it, Marker has both invented a literary form and perfected it.

name: Impostors
summary:
Experience a NEW ERA of social deduction gaming! Outsmart your opponents, form unlikely alliances, trick & deceive to stay alive! Work together to complete tasks but watch out for the impostors! They're lurking in the shadows, ready to sabotage your efforts and kill you off one by one…
Enjoy countless game scenarios with your friends in this 4-15 player party-game, talk your way out of trouble with in-game voice chat, and immerse yourself in an ever-changing world with surprises around every corner!

name: Impasse
summary: A difficult and different minimalist puzzle game. Discover the rules as you go and make your way to the goal of each level.

name: Impetum
summary: IMPETUM - horror, thriller, drama with elements of detective fiction. Can you uncover the truth without losing your mind?

name: I'm on Observation Duty 7
summary: The seventh installment of this beloved franchise presents you with six new levels, unique anomalies and insane intruders. As an employee of a mysterious organization your job is to monitor live surveillance camera footage and spot anomalies. Report any changes in the monitored rooms by clicking on the anomaly and selecting the type OR by choosing the right location and type of the anomaly from a menu to fix it. Anomalies appear at random so you never knows what is going to happen next. Too many active and unreported anomalies means death. Goal is to survive the entire night (from 00:00 to 06:00 in game time). You will need sharp eyes and good memory. The game contains psychological horror that mainly comes from making you paranoid about what has changed.

name: Im Null
summary: Im null is an experimental multiplayer game in which players explore wireframe environments. Im null received praise from critics for its experimental gameplay and themes of isolation and connection.

name: Imada ni Yokuaru Dasshutsu Game
summary: Imada ni Yokuaru Dasshutsu Game, also commonly referred to as "Dona Room 3" or "Dona's Room 3" in the West, is the third game in a series of escape games by Naoki Nakashima.

name: Imp Dreams
summary: Doom Guy goes to the therapist says he's been counting imps to fall asleep.

name: Immortal
summary:
Immortal is an RPG horror game/visual novel that tells the story from multiple perspectives and your choices will impact how the story progresses and who will survive until the end. This game looks at the darker side of immortality and the consequences it can have around those close to you. It features realistic situations with a touch of fantasy.

The story follows twenty-two year old Nicholas, who has just gotten off work. After rejecting a co-workers's invitation to go out, he decides to head home. While taking the bus home, he meets a twenty-four year old writer named Morna and the bus driver, twenty year old, Darcey. The bus soon breaks down, leaving Nicholas, Morna, and Darcey stranded outside a large manor. What lies in this manor will not only change how they see the world but also who they are.

name: Immortal Souls: Dark Crusade
summary: In this action RPG game you try to destroy the monsters of the underworld. You can use various attacks, which come together to form chains. This causes that their power multiplies.

name: I'm in Love With Your Dead Grandmother Presents: Noah SmallJohnson's Puzzle Game
summary: In memory of a woman he never met, Noah SmallJohnson creates the most epic puzzle game ever. Featuring high-score gameplay, catchy tunes, multiple arcade modes, and a Game Show where players can win cheat codes. It’s weird, it’s wild, and it’s unapologetically heartfelt.

name: I'm Not Crazy, Right?: The Cell
I'm Not Crazy, Right?: The Well
Im Bann Der Dunklen Jagd
summary: Dive into an immersive co-op horror experience with a friend. As detectives, you’ll search for clues in a sinister area and must survive the horrors lurking within. Work together to find all the objects and escape before doom catches up with you.

name: I'm a Gensokyo Observer
summary: You worked in a company known for getting rid of anomalies and any paranormal activities. One day, you received a letter from Yukari, asking for your assistance in Gensokyo about paranormal activities which this time, it's from a different source. You have to take care of the anomalies in Gensokyo and make Gensokyo safe again. Good luck.

name: Imprimatura
summary:
Imagine that you are an artist. Imagine that you are in mourning. A painter – your relative, and your former mentor – has died. In their will, they have left you seven paintings of your choosing from their collection. But which seven? What matters to you as both an artist and an inheritor of your mentor’s legacy? And what memories will these paintings stir up?
Imprimatura is a nonlinear work of interactive fiction that makes light use of procedural generation and heavy use of a multilayered painting that changes based on your choices.

name: Imprisoned
summary:
Imprisoned is a Massively Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game (MMORPG) developed with the Unreal Engine 5 graphics engine and advanced predictive artificial intelligence system.

Your objective is to serve your sentence and survive within a hostile prison as a persistent world. During your time behind bars, you must create a character, level up, improve it, and obtain protections and weapons through missions or by eliminating certain enemies you will encounter during your journey through the prison.

name: Imaginytes
summary: Tower defense meets roguelite deckbuilder! Collect, summon and evolve your Imaginyte creatures, and use them to create intricate mazes to defeat the nightmares.

name: Impetus
summary: A vertically scrolling shooter developed by Inofuto for a variety of systems.

name: Imaginary Bad Friend
summary: A short visual novel game in which a boy named Shiomi suddenly appears one day, and the protagonist, who recognizes him as an imaginary friend, converses with him to find out what happened between them.

name: Immortum
summary: Immortum is a Psychological Sci-Fi horror inspired by classic horror. Trapped aboard a decaying spaceship, you must escape mind-bending traps and uncover an impossible truth - as Romi, a mother desperate to find her dying child. Can you discover the answers before your existence is erased?

name: I'm in Love With Your Dead Grandmother Presents: Noah Smalljohnson's Puzzle Game - Digital Deluxe Mega Chad Edition
Imaginary Spectacle Parade
summary: The Imaginary Spectacle Parade is the story of a young man who has experienced something very spectacular from an ordinary amusement park.

name: I'm Here to Shit Ass
summary: An action game where you battle Bill Fucking Clinton!

name: I'm Pregnant at 16
summary: "I'm pregnant at 16" is a visual novel about tough choices, growing up, and relationships during an unexpected pregnancy. Players will face dilemmas, deal with consequences, and explore realistic, challenging situations.

name: Immortal Boy
summary: A 2.5D turn-based RPG where you dodge through enemy turns - and emotional abuse.

name: I'm Truely a Good Guy!
summary: Welcome to Cattlehorse Corp, where deadlines are tight, and backstabbing is tighter! Complete tasks, expose traitors, and suck up to management—just make sure you survive. Use wacky gadgets, bluff, and betray to climb the corporate ladder. In this office, only survivors get promotions!

name: Impossible Moto Sim
summary:
Impossible Moto Sim – Conquer the Sky on Two Wheels!

Welcome to the ultimate challenge for those who live and breathe motorcycles! This is not just a race—it’s a battle against gravity, speed, and fear itself. Imagine tearing through high-altitude tracks suspended 3,000 meters above sea level, with no barriers to save you. Every turn is a test of precision, every jump is a leap of faith, and every second pushes your adrenaline to the max.

name: Impartial
summary: Impartial is an intriguing short 2D narrative game where you take on the role as a conflict resolver - tasked with resolving moral dilemmas between the Police Force and Superheroes to fight crime in Neo-Victorian London.

name: I Mother
summary: Embark on an adventure as a solitary Neanderthal woman in a prehistoric world devoid of language, inspired by the latest scientific discoveries. Decode prehistoric symbols, humanity’s earliest form of communication, and survive long enough to unravel the mystery of human evolution.

name: I'm UFO
summary: Be a UFO. Hard scale against dozens of other UFO's with skill moves, strategy, and automated attacks. See if you can make it to the final UFO and arrive home to have UFO conversations.

name: Imperial Settlers: Imperial Miners
summary: Card placing and engine building game in the world of Imperial Settlers. Digital version of board game hit from Portal Games.

name: Impact
summary: Impact is an immersive sci-fi game set on the Moon. Build and manage a lunar base, generating valuable scientific data along the way. This data is used by the European Space Agency to train a real AI that will eventually land on the Moon.

name: Immortals Revenge
summary: Step into the immersive MMORPG world of Immortals Revenge, blending adventure, role-playing, and hack-and-slash gameplay. With rich storytelling and expansive landscapes to explore, master divine abilities to restore balance to Olympus.

name: I'm Caught in a Time Loop: I Need to Find a Girl as Soon as Possible
summary: The strangest things happen when you don't expect them...

name: Imaginary Chaos Fight
summary: Imaginary Chaos Fight brings intense 2D PvP battles with six unique characters, each with special abilities allowing for diverse combat strategies. Explore different styles, master your tactics, and face off against opponents to prove who is the true champion.

name: Imvi: Echoes of Harmony
summary: Imvi: Echoes of Harmony is a third-person experience where you use the attractive and repulsive forces of black and white singularities to explore an ancient alien civilization to recover your lost memories.

name: Imagine Island
summary:
Imagine Island is a safe, magical online world where kids can play, create, and explore as their own custom avatars.

Designed with safety and creativity in mind, Imagine Island offers fun adventures, silly surprises, and endless ways to express yourself – all in a kid-friendly space built just for them.

name: Immortals
summary: A Classic style beat em' up for mobile phones, Based on the movie of the same name.

name: I'm in Love With Your Dead Grandmother: Online Battle Royale
summary: This game has everything you could wish for in an online game, Battle Pass? Yes! Live Service? Yes again! Dating dead grandmothers with your friends online? YES BABY!!!!

name: Immortal Magus
summary: Immortal Magus is a throwback to old 'artillery' games such as Scorched Earth or Pocket Tanks, but in a fantasy setting. In a simple mixture of turn-based and real-time strategy, defeat your enemy by hurling spells and summoning Units in destructible environments.

name: Impunes
summary: Open world game set in Brazil: Explore, steal, kill or simply work. Roleplay-sandbox Infinitely expandable.

name: I'm Not Alone
summary:
You wake up in your room.

Your world revolves around a digital game on your computer and an empty bed.

Time moves on, indifferent, as the routine repeats itself. Something has changed... but you can't tell what.

name: I'm Not Spider
summary: A 2D platform game, by dragging the character's corner to climb upward, the character's feet can be glued to some platforms, intended to test the player's ability to control the mouse

name: Immaculate Grid
summary: A daily trivia game, where players aim to fill out a 3x3 grid with 9 unique players of a sport who each meet the category requirements of their row and column.

name: I'm Home Already
summary: a little dog in a little town

name: Immortality
summary: In a parallel Journey to the West, Sun Wukong seeks immortality—not redemption. With heavenly tribulations approaching, he must explore, battle fierce enemies, and forge magical artifacts to survive and ascend to eternal life.

name: Important People of History: Presidents - George Washington
summary:
Learn all about George Washington in this visual novel biography containing rare photos from inside the Washington Monument, Washington's home at Mount Vernon, Yorktown where he achieved final victory in the Revolutionary War, and much more. Soldier, General, Spymaster, and President - this is George Washington!

Part of the Important People of History series:
1. George Washington
2. Thomas Jefferson
3. Abraham Lincoln

All three games about US Presidents releasing in 2026 to commemorate the 250th anniversary of the signing of the Declaration of Independence back in 1776

Proudly made in Washington’s home state of Virginia

name: Important People of History: Presidents - Thomas Jefferson
summary:
Learn all about Thomas Jefferson in this visual novel biography containing rare photos of the room where the Declaration of Independence was signed, Jefferson’s Monticello home, the National Archives where the Declaration is kept, and much more. Writer, Diplomat, President - this is Thomas Jefferson!

Part of the Important People of History series:
1. George Washington
2. Thomas Jefferson
3. Abraham Lincoln

All three games about US Presidents releasing in 2026 to commemorate the 250th anniversary of the signing of the Declaration of Independence back in 1776

Proudly made in Jefferson’s home state of Virginia

name: Important People of History: Presidents - Abraham Lincoln
summary:
Learn all about Abraham Lincoln in this visual novel biography containing rare photos of Lincoln’s hat from the day he was shot, the Lincoln Memorial, where he gave the Gettysburg address, and much more. Lawyer, President, Emancipator - this is Abraham Lincoln!

Part of the Important People of History series:
1. George Washington
2. Thomas Jefferson
3. Abraham Lincoln

All three games about US Presidents releasing in 2026 to commemorate the 250th anniversary of the signing of the Declaration of Independence back in 1776

Proudly made in the Washington DC area

name: Immortal Love: Bitter Awakening - Collector's Edition
summary: The Bear and Owl clans have despised each other for centuries, and their hatred has come to a head in the face of love. Do you have what it takes to break a curse that separates you from your beloved and save your people in time? The collector's edition of this hidden object game has a bonus gameplay chapter, ingame guide and other goodies.

name: Imperfect Garden
summary: Imperfect Garden is an action-packed boss rush with two levels, each culminating in a unique boss that tests your reflexes. You control a one-armed youth in a desolate world, fighting powerful Perpetuos—proving that determination can triumph over adversity.

name: Immortal Immanuel
summary: A Touhou Fanmade STG with 6 normal stages and an Extra Stage.

name: I'm Sleep!
summary:
A fascinating short story about the dream of a young man Alexander, who cannot wake up and is stuck in his dream. According to the plot, the day before the coma, the main character managed to experience several confessions, about betrayal, treason and farewell.

The main character did not want to finish his school and could not stand it. In his dream, he dreamed that everything. His hell was over and that a new one had begun. Hell - emptiness and indifference. This touched him to the depths of his soul.

name: I’m Not Allowed in that Store Anymore
summary: A Playdate game about making disguises

name: Imagine Sisyphus Happy
summary:
Sisyphus, king of Corinth, has tricked the Gods and Death. To punish him, the Gods condemned him to push a boulder uphill forever, only for it to roll back each time.
But Sisyphus didn't give up. He decided to livestream it.

Imagine Sisyphus Happy is a Steamer Sim, Clicker and QTE mix game about life, spectacle, and finding meaning in repetition. Roll your boulder, pull off stunts, and try to make the eternal grind worth living.

Push the boulder. Do tricks. Go live.

Progressing from Greek myth to the modern day, the story asks two simple questions:
- Aren’t you a Sisyphus too?
- Can you Imagine Sisyphus Happy?

name: I'm a Gensokyo Observer 2: Chen's Duty
summary: After Thomas finished the observing duty and got sent back home by Yukari, few weeks later, the anomaly starts to haunt few more places within Gensokyo again. Yukari wants Thomas to have a break so someone else need to do an observing job and that's when Chen decided to step in. You'll be playing as Chen and you must observe the haunted locations, report the anomaly and survive until sunrise.

name: I'm Still Here
summary: I'M STILL HERE - is a realistic horror game with an interesting plot and horrific screamers.

name: I'm Not a Robot
summary: A webgame where you must prove that you're a human by solving increasingly difficult captchas.

name: Imitation
summary: A choice-driven adventure where you play as a young girl in a world where immortality is the norm. In this world, immortal humans are referred to as "Players." Your choices affect Stress and Affinity. Through multiple playthroughs, get closer to the hidden truths and endings.

name: I'm on Observation Duty 8
summary:
As an employee of a mysterious organization, your job is to monitor live surveillance camera footage and report other-worldly anomalies using your sharp eyes and good memory.

Monitor surveillance cameras across six unique levels, each with their own unnerving "anomalies"—supernatural occurrences ranging from subtle environmental shifts to grotesque otherworldly intruders. Report anomalies to "fix" them and survive the night. If you can.

I'm on Observation Duty is the original viral franchise that ignited a trend in spot-the-difference horror games that are now loved by players worldwide.

name: Immortal Legends
summary: Idle vertical MMORPG. Transform into powerful Gods and Angels.

name: Immortal Family
summary: The player plays the role of a family patriarch, establishes a family, and then occupies a small island for cultivation in a sea area, leading the family to gradually grow and develop. In the process of growth, you can capture other islands for cultivation, explore the deep sea, search for treasures in secret places, etc.

name: Immortality Factory
summary: Build and automate your factory to unlock new machinery and recipes in this pixel-art automation idle game.

name: Immortal Seeker
summary: "Immortal Seeker" is a RogueLite game with a cultivation theme. As you journey, you can enhance your cultivation realm, find immortal weapons, learn secret books to defeat demons and monsters. Seek what is immortality and what is the Dao, and embark on your own path of cultivation.

name: I'm on Sorority Duty
summary: You've just started a surveillance job at the local paranormal security corp, and now you're on Sorority Duty! A horror parody, spot-the-difference game about a haunting at Kappa Kappa Tease.

name: Impact Trial: Hyperchaos
summary: Face endless waves and survive the chaos! Impact Trial: Hyperchaos is a casual spaceship bullet hell with adaptive difficulty, where your reflexes and decisions make the difference against hundreds of relentless enemies. Push your limits and climb the global leaderboards.

name: I'm Not a Robot!
summary: "I'm Not a Robot" is an atmospheric horror with old-school 3D and dark humor, telling the story of quickly making $300 in a shady alley. Sounds safe, right? Grab an easy payday or uncover all the secrets of the dark cult that has taken over your small town.

name: I'm not a Human: Horror Simulator
Improvised Tactics
summary: Improvised Tactics is a single player RTS game that involves a focus on individual soldiers on a battlefield. You can command units on where to go or even play as the units to achieve your goals. Improvised Tactics offers several game modes for you to play!

name: Immortal Farmer: System’s Mandate
summary: Welcome to Immortal Farmer: System’s Mandate, a paradise blending adventure, cultivation, and rural life. In this apocalyptic world overrun by demons, you are transmigrated into a refugee and stumble upon a mysterious village—Taoyuan Village, protected by cultivators.

name: I Made Her Up
summary: I Made Her Up is a narrative-driven visual novel that explores obsession, loneliness, and the power of creativity. It asks the timeless question: what if the person you loved most never truly existed?

name: I'm Struggling
summary:
[I'm Struggling] Is a short atmospheric journey taking inspiration from a poem by Avalon complemented by the aesthetics of PS1-era graphics.

In the shadowed corners of a forgotten town, where dreams lie dormant and the weight of reality presses heavy, an echo of a poem unfolds.

This is not a game it's a reflection of the human spirit's resilience, a regret for lost dreams, and a quiet hope for a new beginning.

Will you find meaning in the shadows, will you find comfort in the ambiance or will it consume you ?

name: Imago
summary: As a journalist, immerse yourself in the places you wrote articles about. Figure out what is happening around you and plunge into the world of old floppy disks and pixel graphics of the 80s, alternating with scenes of the real world.

name: Imperial Bureaucracy Hero
summary: IBH is a rich role playing game at the end of time. You're a mid-level official in a dying sci-fi regime, given the impossible task of fixing a faltering machine; explore a vast world, define your mind, flex your authority, and become a sinner or a savior in countless other stories.

name: Imaginary Friend Institution
summary: Experience the not-so-ordinary life of a young institutionalized woman in the 1950's. Amidst the daily struggles and overbearing loneliness, she often sees things that others do not. However, as the imaginary begins to seep into reality, she realizes she may not be as crazy as she once thought.

name: Imagine Future
summary: "Imagine Future" is a Visual Novel with a campus theme. You will follow the perspective of the protagonist Ji Wang, experience the life of a high school student. The final examination seemed so far away. one day, it was close at hand. Standing at the crossroads of life, what choice will you make?

name: I'm Making a Monster
summary: Try to build a monster while your friends bother you to take breaks. I'm Making a Monster is part monster-dress-up game, part friend-dating simulator, and all how-not-to-deal-with-loss advice column. Delve into this short interactive narrative and decide what you truly value.

name: Imp
summary: Fight hordes of aliens and visit desolate moons in this arcade-inspired third-person shooter.

name: Imago Season
summary: A true narrative roleplaying experience. Explore an alien city inhabited by human-insect hybrids. Roll dice, join a revolution, become a mutant yourself. The choices are yours, but so are the consequences.

name: Imitation Girl
summary: I spend my days cleaning a mansion, alongside an android girl. I’m tired of this life, and I’m tired of the master of the house.

name: Immortal Rebirth
summary: Immortal Rebirth is a survivor-like roguelite combining fast-paced combat, loot hunting, and backpack-based strategy. Fight endless demon waves, arrange artifacts to trigger synergies, and shape your own build across repeated runs in an Eastern fantasy world.

name: Imprinted
summary: Looking for a forensic specialist to restore damaged audio tapes (late 1970s). Warning: The artist was involved in the occult; she disappeared under suspicious circumstances. The nature of the recordings may be distressing. Mental clarity and resilience are a must. QUOTE REQUESTED.

name: I'm a Human
summary: Forget defense. This is Reverse Tower Defense where you are the threat. Lead the AI, build robots and destroy human bases.Your goal is invasion. Your weapon is the swarm.

name: Imminent
summary: This game is a highly challenging shooting game that features unique geometric effects, providing players with an unprecedented visual experience.

name: I’m a Wizard, But I Dig
summary: Shorten your journey to the castle by digging a tunnel through the mountain. Use magic and craft: swing your pickaxe, cast spells, blow up obstacles, and light your path with glowing slimes. Trade resources with the Goose, unlock new tools, and uncover the mountain's secrets.

name: I'm No Demonlord
summary: I'm No Demonlord is a Roguelike shooter bullet hell game. High freedom in mechanics leads to unique playthroughs. As a demon-possessed hero, battle enemies, grow, and unveil dark schemes. Can he accept his new role? Save "kinds" or destroy "outsiders"? Good or evil? The choice is yours.

name: Immunica
summary: Fight, upgrade, and survive against the pathogens invading your body.

name: Imperial Command
summary: Imperial Command is a turn-based strategy board game inspired by classics like Risk. Conquer a hex-based map, build your economy, and battle friends or AI in multiplayer—fully playable on Steam Deck.

name: Improper
summary: A tiny imp with uncontrollable OCD must face his obsession with order. Using magical spells, he must clean up the chaos while trying to keep his compulsion in check. Explore an overworld filled with diverse biomes, solve absurd situations, and uncover the source of the mess.
